casebody.data:
BEAVERCREEK TOWNE STATION, L.L.C.
v.
GREENE CTY. BD. OF REVISION 2018-0273 Supreme Court of Ohio. June 24, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On joint motion to remand with instructions to accept stipulation of value. Cause remanded to the Board of Tax Appeals to take further action as appropriate.
